name: Patrick Smyth's Code Samples
body:
### An assortment of my publicly available coding samples
Please be aware, these samples do not include any of my recent professional work.  These are a collection of old projects and other code developed on the side during personal time.  They should serve as a general reference to my coding capabilities, but in no way represent all of my skills. 

Please refer to my resume [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8q4jQbZMnFpbDQzSW1RUnlVbmM/edit?usp=sharing) for a list of my most recent official projects.

The reason my most recent work is not available is because all of my source code developed during my time at Fidelity is considered proprietary.  If you have further questions, email me and I can share the contact info of my Fidelity supervisor.  

### Support or Contact
Patrick Smyth
psmyth1@alumni.nd.edu
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
